basic.name: Closed
basic.description: Players begin the game with their hands face down.

basic.name: Same
basic.description: Captured if adjacent ranks are equal on 2 or more sides.

basic.name: Plus
basic.description: Captured if adjacent ranks sum up to the same value on 2 or more sides.

basic.name: Combo
basic.description: Cards captured by Same or Plus subsequently capture adjacent cards with the basic rule.

basic.name: Same Wall
basic.description: The edges of the board are counted as A ranks for the purposes of the Same rule.

basic.name: Elemental
basic.description: Elements are randomly placed on the board. If a played card matches the element, its ranks are increased by one. If not, they decrease by one.

basic.name: Random
basic.description: Both player's start with a random selection of cards from their collections.

basic.name: Sudden Death
basic.description: In the case of a draw, the game begins again with each player using the cards they captured in the last round.

basic.name: Take One
basic.description: The winner selects one card from their opponent's hand.

basic.name: Take Direct
basic.description: Player's keep only the cards they've captured.

basic.name: Take Difference
basic.description: Subtract the losing score from the winning score; this is how many cards the winner will take from their opponent's hand.

basic.name: Take All
basic.description: The winner takes all cards from their opponent's hand.
